page.title: 09 Our May Fair
page.content: The{May Fair}is a{custom}to celebrate the coming of summer. We had a{coutry dancing}display for our parents. There was a May Queen to open the May Fair and help pick the winners of the raffles. There was an inflatable castle. There were hot dogs and coca cola to eat and drink. A hot dog is a roll with a sausage in it. We had a make up{stall}which sold lipstick and blusher that makes your cheeks red and perfume that makes you smell nice. There was a decorated bicyle competition and my friend won it. We had a board with holes in it and you had to throw the bean bags to get the highest score. There was a game where you chose some names for a toy clown and the queen picked a name out of a tin and the person who picked the right name won the toy clown.
